knimeNode.name: DynamicColumnGenerator
knimeNode.shortDescription: A dynamic column generator for appending columns to tables to assist with workflow testing, visualization techniques and general validation.

fullDescription.intro: This node adds a column of randomly generated strings or doubles and appends it to the input table, outputting an unaltered copy of the input table with an additional random values column.
fullDescription.option: Name the new column to be appended to the output table.

option.name: Check for string column, blank for double column.

fullDescription.option: Check this option for to generate a random string column, leave blank to generate a column of random doubles.

ports.inPort: Intakes a table with at least one existing column.
ports.outPort: Outputs a table with an additional column of random values.
